## DataRouter class

Special implementation of router that allows routing with sending complex data to routed component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DataRouter 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_router)](./common-router.datarouter._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DataRouter</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [valuePromise](./common-router.datarouter.valuepromise.md) |  | Promise&lt;any&gt; | Gets promise that resolves into value for current route |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [navigate(linkParams, routeData)](./common-router.datarouter.navigate.md) |  | Navigate based on the provided Route Link DSL. This method also allows you to provide complex data for your route |
